com.revo.deployr.client.api

Interface RUserJobCalls

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RUser

    public interface RUserJobCalls
    Defines job related interfaces for DeployR-managed user.

    • Method Summary

      Deprecated. 
      As of release 7.1, use submitJobScript method that supports scriptDirectory parameter. This deprecated call assumes each script is found in the root directory.

      • submitJobScript

        @Deprecated
RJob submitJobScript(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String jobDescr,
                              java.lang.String scriptName,
                              java.lang.String scriptAuthor,
                              java.lang.String scriptVersion)
                     throws RClientException,
                            RSecurityException,
                            RDataException
        Deprecated. As of release 7.1, use submitJobScript method that supports scriptDirectory parameter. This deprecated call assumes each script is found in the root directory.
        Submit a single repository-managed script or a chain of repository-managed scripts (found in the root directory) to execute as a job.

        To submit a chain of repository-managed scripts on this call provide a comma-separated list of values on the scriptName, scriptAuthor and optionally scriptVersion parameters. Chained execution executes each of the scripts identified on the call in a sequential fashion on the R session, with execution occuring in the order specified on the parameter list.

        Returns:
        RJob
        Throws:
        RClientException - if RClient fails to complete call.
        RSecurityException - if DeployR server security conditions not met on call.
        RDataException

      • submitJobScript

        @Deprecated
RJob submitJobScript(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String jobDescr,
                              java.lang.String scriptName,
                              java.lang.String scriptAuthor,
                              java.lang.String scriptVersion,
                              JobExecutionOptions options)
                     throws RClientException,
                            RSecurityException,
                            RDataException
        Deprecated. As of release 7.1, use submitJobScript method that supports scriptDirectory parameter. This deprecated call assumes each script is found in the root directory.
        Submit a single repository-managed script or a chain of repository-managed scripts to execute as a job.

        To submit a chain of repository-managed scripts on this call provide a comma-separated list of values on the scriptName, scriptAuthor and optionally scriptVersion parameters. Chained execution executes each of the scripts identified on the call in a sequential fashion on the R session, with execution occuring in the order specified on the parameter list.

        Returns:
        RJob
        Throws:
        RClientException - if RClient fails to complete call.
        RSecurityException - if DeployR server security conditions not met on call.
        RDataException

        RJob submitJobScript(java.lang.String jobName,
                   java.lang.String jobDescr,

                   java.lang.String scriptDirectory,
                   java.lang.String scriptAuthor,
                   java.lang.String scriptVersion)
                     throws RClientException,
                            RSecurityException,

        Submit a single repository-managed script or a chain of repository-managed scripts to execute as a job.

        To submit a chain of repository-managed scripts on this call provide a comma-separated list of values on the scriptName, scriptAuthor and optionally scriptVersion parameters. Chained execution executes each of the scripts identified on the call in a sequential fashion on the R session, with execution occuring in the order specified on the parameter list.

        Returns:
        RJob
        Throws:
        RClientException - if RClient fails to complete call.
        RSecurityException - if DeployR server security conditions not met on call.

      • submitJobScript

        RJob submitJobScript(java.lang.String jobName,
                   java.lang.String jobDescr,
                   java.lang.String scriptName,
                   java.lang.String scriptDirectory,
                   java.lang.String scriptAuthor,
                   java.lang.String scriptVersion,
                   JobExecutionOptions options)
                     throws RClientException,
                            RSecurityException,
                            RDataException
        Submit a single repository-managed script or a chain of repository-managed scripts to execute as a job.

        To submit a chain of repository-managed scripts on this call provide a comma-separated list of values on the scriptName, scriptAuthor and optionally scriptVersion parameters. Chained execution executes each of the scripts identified on the call in a sequential fashion on the R session, with execution occuring in the order specified on the parameter list.

        Returns:
        RJob
        Throws:
        RClientException - if RClient fails to complete call.
        RSecurityException - if DeployR server security conditions not met on call.
        RDataException

      • submitJobExternal

        RJob submitJobExternal(java.lang.String jobName,
                     java.lang.String jobDescr,
                     java.lang.String externalSource,
                     JobExecutionOptions options)
                       throws RClientException,
                              RSecurityException,
                              RDataException
        Submit a single script found on a URL/path or a chain of scripts found on a set of URLs/paths on the current project.

        To submit a chain of repository-managed scripts on this call provide a comma-separated list of values on the externalSource parameter.

        POWER_USER privileges are required for this call.

        Returns:
        RJob
        Throws:
        RClientException - if RClient fails to complete call.
        RSecurityException - if DeployR server security conditions not met on call.
        RDataException
